medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began 4 days prior to evaluation, with severe epigastric abdominal pain radiating to the back. Pain was associated with nausea and chills. Initial improvement followed unknown medications from cruise physician, but pain quickly returned, leading to emergent evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Myasthenia, HCV, Toxoplasmosis of the right eye - legally blind, Hypertension, Diabetes
medical_history.family_history: Hypertension from the paternal side; Hypertension and diabetes from the maternal side; one half-sister and one full sister with breast cancer; eldest daughter has toxoplasmosis of one eye.
